まっぴら御免: (まっぴらごめん) - had enough/flatly refusing/wouldn't do for anything; begging pardon
まっ先: (まっさき) - the head; the foremost; beginning; the very front
まっ白: (まっしろ) - pure white; blank (e.g. mind, paper)
まっ赤っ赤: (まっかっか) - very bright red/deep red/extremely flushed (of face); downright (e.g. lie)/complete/utter
まつ毛エクステンション: (まつげエクステンション) - eyelash extensions
までなら: (までなら) - up to ... (e.g. items) (nuance of comparison); until ... (times); as far as
までもない: (までもない) - (after verb phrase) doesn't amount to doing (something); not significant enough to require (something); unnecessary
まとい付く: (まといつく) - to entwine; to follow about
まとぎ: (まとぎ) - ancient hunting communities in Tohoku
まとめて: (まとめて) - in one go; all at once; altogether; all in one piece
まとめ上げる: (まとめあげる) - to compile; to bring together; to weave; to put together
まとめ役: (まとめやく) - mediator; peacemaker; troubleshooter; manager
まとめ買い: (matomegai) - juntar-se e comprar, fazendo uma grande compra
まとわり付く: (まとわりつく) - to coil about; to follow about
まどろこい: (まどろこい) - dull (e.g. of movement or reaction); sluggish
まどろこしい: (まどろこい) - dull (e.g. of movement or reaction); sluggish
まどろっこい: (まどろこい) - dull (e.g. of movement or reaction); sluggish
まどろっこしい: (まどろこい) - dull (e.g. of movement or reaction); sluggish
まなじりを決して: (まなじりをけっして) - with one's eyes flashing
まの当り: (まのあたり) - just before one's eyes; in one's presence; personally
まひょ: (まひょ) - (ましょ is a colloquialism in standard Japanese; まひょ is a colloquialism in Kansai dialect)  (used to express the speaker's volition) I'll; (used to make an invitation, request, etc.) let's; (used to express a conjecture) probably
まぶ達: (マブダチ) - true friend; close friend
まへん: (まへん) - suffix used to negate a verb in the non-past tense
まべ貝: (マベガイ) - penguin wing oyster (Pteria penguin)
まむし: (まむし) - broiled eel (usu. mixed into rice)
まむし丼: (まむしどん) - bowl of eel and rice (donburi)
まめぶ汁: (まめぶじる) - soup of dumplings filled with walnuts and brown sugar, boiled together with vegetables, tofu, etc.
まやかし: (まやかし) - deception; make-believe; fake; counterfeit; phony
まやかす: (まやかす) - to cheat; to swindle; to deceive
まる聞こえ: (まるぎこえ) - being able to hear everything (esp. when one was not intended to)
まる裸: (まるはだか) - nude; utterly stark naked; wearing only one's birthday suit
まる覚え: (まるおぼえ) - full memorization; full memorisation
まわし打ち: (まわしうち) - {mahj} discarding somewhat safe tiles while still trying to win a hand
まんが喫茶: (まんがきっさ) - manga cafe; coffee shop with a manga library (usu. has Internet facilities and charges by the hour)
まんざら夢ではない: (まんざらゆめではない) - not altogether a dream
まんじり: (まんじり) - (usu. with negative verb) nap/doze/short sleep; staringly/fixedly
まんじりともしない: (まんじりともせず) - not sleeping a wink/wide awake all night; without moving
まんじりともせず: (まんじりともせず) - not sleeping a wink/wide awake all night; without moving
まんねん: (まんねん) - it is assuredly that...
まんまと: (manmato) - com êxito, justamente, habilidosamente, agradavelmente, completamente
まん中: (まんなか) - middle; centre; center; mid-way
まん丸: (まんまる) - (also まん円) perfect circle
まん前: (まんまえ) - right in front; just opposite; under the nose
まん延: (まんえん) - spread (e.g. of a disease); rampancy; infestation; proliferation; being widespread
み: (み) - (also written with the ateji 味)  -ness (nominalizing suffix, esp. of sensory or subjective adjectives); nominalizing suffix indicating location; (as ...mi ...mi) alternating between ... and ...
みいちゃんはあちゃん: (みいちゃんはあちゃん) - the follower of each new fad
みいはあ: (みいはあ) - follower of each new fad; poser/a lowbrow/fanboy/fangirl; lowbrow/flippant
みかん箱: (みかんばこ) - cardboard box for mandarin oranges
みく: (みく) - (yakuza slang) sword, dagger, etc. used in crime
みこしを担ぐ: (みこしをかつぐ) - to wheedle a person into doing something; to carry a portable shrine
みこしを据える: (みこしをすえる) - to ensconce oneself (e.g. in a chair); to settle oneself down; to plant oneself
みしみし: (みしみし) - creaking; groaning (e.g. of something under physical stress)
みじん粉: (みじんこ) - rice granules; coarse glutinous rice flour (often used in candy production)
みずがめ座: (みずがめざ) - Aquarius (constellation); the Water Carrier; the Water Bearer
みずへび座: (みずへびざ) - {astron} Hydrus (constellation); the Water Snake
みず菜: (ミズナ) - mizuna (Brassica rapa var. nipposinica)/potherb mustard; Elatostema umbellatum var. majus (variety of plant related to the nettles)
みそ炒め: (みそいため) - fried dish seasoned with miso
みそ煮: (みそに) - food cooked in miso; cooking in miso
みそ餡: (みそあん) - sweet paste of white beans and miso
みたい: (みたい) - -like; sort of; similar to; resembling
みたらし団子: (みたらしだんご) - skewered rice dumplings in a sweet soy glaze
みだれ髪: (みだれがみ) - disheveled hair; unravelled hair
みつかけ星: (みつかけぼし) - Chinese "Chariot" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
みつ豆: (mitsumame) - mistura de feijão cozido, cubos de agar, pedaços de frutas e xarope
みどり色: (みどりいろ) - green; emerald green; green color of new foliage; verdure
みなし有価証券: (みなしゆうかしょうけん) - deemed securities
みなし配当: (みなしはいとう) - consent dividend; constructive dividend; deemed dividend
みなみのうお座: (みなみのうおざ) - {astron} Piscis Austrinus (constellation); the Southern Fish
みなみのかんむり座: (みなみのかんむりざ) - {astron} Corona Australis (constellation); the Southern Crown
みなみのさんかく座: (みなみのさんかくざ) - {astron} Triangulum Australe (constellation); the Southern Triangle
みぶ菜: (ミブナ) - Brassica campestris var. laciniifolia (variety of wild mustard)
